title: WANTED: Any OJ Card for a beginner
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WANTED: Any OJ Card for a beginner
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bill K@sel
I have plenty of E & T cards but would like to make my way to the slippery slope that is Old Judge cards.  I'm looking for an inexpensive example or two that I can use to become more familiar with the cards before investing any serious dough into them.

My only requirements are that they measure out and are not skinned.  Willing to go up to $100 in this first foray.

Email me if you have any to spare!

Thanks as always!

Bill
